title: Boshi

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Imitate** (2x): Instantly pick a Koopa member in the team, dead or alive, you may use one of their abilities at the cost of the ability's ammo.
- **Echo** (2x, day): During the next night, you may talk with the dead, any roles that are doing the same will be kicked while this is active.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **Imitate** costs no ammo while alive, you may use it while dead.
- **Imitate**d attacks are always set to the None tier.

desc:
Post 4544
*"Boshi is a lone Blue Yoshi and the rival of Yoshi, his appearance is distinct from the other Yoshis in that he wears sunglasses, a spiked collar, and anklets on his feet."*
